= News =

== 2009-04-25 ==

BudgetFrik Beta 0.2 launched!

=== Features ===

  * Edit expenses - Category/SubCategory, Notes, Currency, Value and Date
  * Delete expenses
  * Calendar with 4 views: Day, Week, Month and Year
  * Various bug fixes
  * Several awesome new bugs
